import React from 'react'; const ProfileMainContent = ({ profile, onEdit, userRole }) => { const renderFreelancerContent = () => (
{/* Web and software development section */}

Web and software development

${profile.hourly_rate}/hr

{profile.bio}

{/* Portfolio section */}

Portfolio

{profile.portfolio && profile.portfolio.length > 0 ? (
{profile.portfolio.map((item, index) => (
{item.type === 'image' && ( )} {item.type === 'video_link' && (
Open video
)} {item.type === 'video' && (
))}
) : (

Add items to your portfolio to showcase your work

)}
{/* Work history */}

Work history

{profile.work_history && profile.work_history.length > 0 ? (
{profile.work_history.map((job, index) => (

{job.position}

{job.company}

{job.start} - {job.end}

{job.description &&

{job.description}

}
))}
) : (

No work history added

)}
{/* Skills */}

Skills

{profile.skills && profile.skills.length > 0 ? (
{profile.skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
) : (

No skills added yet

)}
{/* Project catalog */}

Your project catalog

Projects are a new way to earn on Upwork that helps you do more of the work you love to do. Create project offerings that highlight your strengths and attract more clients.

{profile.project_catalog && profile.project_catalog.length > 0 ? (
{profile.project_catalog.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.price} • {project.duration}

{project.description &&

{project.description}

} {project.category && {project.category}}
))}
) : (

No projects added yet

)}
); const renderClientContent = () => (
{/* Company Description */}

Company Description

{profile.company_description}

{/* Jobs Posted */}

Jobs Posted

No jobs posted yet

{/* Hiring Preferences */}

Hiring Preferences

{profile.experience_level || 'Not specified'}

Not specified

); return (
{userRole === 'freelancer' ? renderFreelancerContent() : renderClientContent()}
); }; export default ProfileMainContent;
